name: Seahorse Saga Early Concept Demo
description:
Seahorse Saga is an undersea adventure turn-based RPG starring Tyro the Seahorse. In this early concept demo from PAX East 2020, Tyro & Co. are tasked with freeing the Kelp Forest from a deadly foe...Explore the forest and fight enemies!

Please note: This early concept demo does not reflect the final product. Development has already surpassed this demo and what is present here is not final.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeahorseSaga

...and Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SeahorseSaga

Join our Discord!: https://discord.gg/T5VEby7
